channel.title: Ethan's Techblog Feed
channel.description: XML RSS 2.0 feed for Ethan Eldridge's tech blog

item.title: Let's Exploit Magento! (<1.9.2.3)
item.description: ![CDATA[Educational example of how to create an Exploit for Magento systems running versions less than 1.9.2.3!]]

item.title: How to implement Subresource Integrity (SRI)
item.description: ![CDATA[SRI is an upcoming way to secure third party assets and provide defense against malicious code being ran within browsers. In this post I talk about how to implement and automate updating HTML elements with the required attributes]]

item.title: How to test the PlayFramework Mailer
item.description: ![CDATA[SMTP Servers can be a pain to setup, but if you're using a JVM based language you're in luck! This post shows how to integrate GreenMail with Play!]]

item.title: Upload binary data in play
item.description: ![CDATA[How to upload binary data in play and parse the bytes. Also shows how to grab EXIF data from an image as an example of the upload.]]

item.title: Bashing Logs
item.description: ![CDATA[Monitoring log files and performing an action once the file is silent for a period]]

item.title: Building Content State from Workflow and Audit Logs
item.description: ![CDATA[Workflows are integral to any business, and keeping track of changes is as well. There are many systems out there that do this, but what are some basics? This post explores some.]]

item.title: How to set Netty options in Playframework
item.description: ![CDATA[Setting netty options like timeouts or backlog's is easy if you know how. This is how to do it with play]]

item.title: How to connect VisualVM to Docker
item.description: ![CDATA[Connecting to a JVM is easy with VisualVM, butwhen it's a remote machine you need to add a few parameters. Dockers no different.]]

item.title: How to create an SBT task that takes an argument
item.description: ![CDATA[If a task only differs by a parameter, then use a parameter! How to do this in SBT isn't too hard, but SBT's documentation can be thick. This post will help.]]

item.title: Combine XML files with Bash
item.description: ![CDATA[How to handle simple XML with the built in CLI tools]]

item.title: Scala, XML, and XSD Validation
item.description: ![CDATA[Loading XML in scala is easy, but you can only gain a sense of type safety if your XML is loaded and validated against a schema. Here's how to do that]]

item.title: Spray ToResponseMarshallable "Too Many Arguments" error
item.description: ![CDATA[An error with a non-helpful error message and its solution.]]

item.title: NewRelic, Scala, and XML Instrumentation
item.description: ![CDATA[The XML Instrumentation of New Relic allows you to monitor your code without modifying the source itself. In order to do so you need to know classnames, and this post talks about finding out what classes those are.]]

item.title: WordPress 4.2 Exploit, SQL Injection Edition
item.description: ![CDATA[While looking through my email I saw CVE-2015-2213 and decided to try to exploit it on my local machine to compromise a wordpress site. Script Kiddies don't try this at home! (Post for educational purposes only)]]

item.title: Multiple Deploy Keys and Jenkins
item.description: ![CDATA[Setting up multiply deploy keys and continous integration in jenkins with github.]]

item.title: Administrative Gotcha when doing local proxying
item.description: ![CDATA[Attempts at security don't matter if people don't test things or understand the full configuration of a system]]

item.title: Spray's Transparent Head Requests and Testing
item.description: ![CDATA[It is not possible to fully test HEAD-only routes in spray, and this can lead to unexpected behaviors in production system. This post is about a gotcha to be wary of]]

item.title: Logging to a File in Spray
item.description: ![CDATA[Setting up logback files with AsyncAppenders for Spray]]

item.title: Serializing Generic Types with Spray JSON Library
item.description: ![CDATA[Continuing from the last post, this is how you can take generic base classes and allow the serialization code to convert them to the appropriate subclass.]]

item.title: Serializing java.util.Locale with Spray JSON library
item.description: ![CDATA[An example of how to serialize and deserialize the Locale class using the spray-json library]]

item.title: A Year of committing to Github
item.description: ![CDATA[I decided to challenge myself to commit every day for a year to github, so I did. And this is some reflection on what doing that has done for me]]

item.title: Aspect Ratios, Math, and Scala
item.description: ![CDATA[A post about implementing AspectRatio Enums and some helpful conversion implicits]]

item.title: 401 Unauthorized and 400 Bad Request from Sonatype Nexus in SBT
item.description: ![CDATA[How to fix SBT and Nexus sonatype when you're just starting out and making mistakes. A few cautionary points]]

item.title: Type Error when using None as a default to Option.fold
item.description: ![CDATA[Using fold on option is a considered more functional, using None as a default will cause a compilation error because None doesn't share a common ancestor with the other result, this is how to get around that.]]

item.title: Scala Scrimage error solution: the org.apache.batik.transcoder.TranscoderException
item.description: ![CDATA[Ran into an error about not being able to find the SVGImageReader class with a root cause of TranscoderException, this is how to fix it]]

item.title: Manipulating XML with PHP
item.description: ![CDATA[A few ways to add, remove, and update XML node values with PHP's DOM libraries]]

item.title: Generate Conditional AWS Group Policies with AWScala
item.description: ![CDATA[How to programmatically generate a policy containing conditionals for AWS group S3 access with AWScala]]

item.title: Reverse routing with non-standard controller packages in Play
item.description: ![CDATA[Having a different package hierarchy than that shown in the play documentation can make one wonder how to link to actions in templates. This is how you do it!]]

item.title: Trigger Asynchronous Jobs in Play 2.3
item.description: ![CDATA[Since version 2 of the PlayFramework deprecated the jobs package, you need to create jobs in a different way. This is how to use the Akka System embedded in play to do so]]

item.title: Non Empty List Form Validation in Play
item.description: ![CDATA[How to use Play's form validation package to create non-empty constraints when binding forms]]

item.title: PHP Snippet
item.description: ![CDATA[A snippet of code displaying the elegance and usefulness of PHP]]

item.title: shell_exec with sudo in php
item.description: ![CDATA[How to setup your system to run shell_exec from a web server that needs root privilege.]]

item.title: Using sassc with play-sass plugin
item.description: ![CDATA[How to use the c sass compiler sassc with play-sass]]

item.title: Akka DSL's and Routing In Play with Cake Pattern
item.description: ![CDATA[A look at a basic Akka program, then into how to setup multiple routes using the Cake Pattern in Spray]]

item.title: Which is faster, string interpolation or addition in python?
item.description: ![CDATA[Ever wonder if string addition is faster than interpolation? Or if it's the other way around? In this post I show you just how to find out for yourself, and of course, which is faster]]

item.title: Dot Paths in Harp? Unexpected Behavior!
item.description: ![CDATA[Truncation of keys in _data.json results in 404s if you have dots in your url paths when you use HarpJS]]

item.title: Value EnablePlugins is not a member of sbt.Project error
item.description: ![CDATA[An error I ran into while setting up a project that had an unintuitive solution]]

item.title: Install and Backup a MongoDB Replica Set
item.description: ![CDATA[How to create a development mongo replica cluster and a simple way of backing up the data.]]

item.title: Handling Has-Many Relationships with Slick
item.description: ![CDATA[An example of how to query Slick for has many relationships and map the results to case classes]]

item.title: Value Raw is not a member of String, Scala Error
item.description: ![CDATA[Stumbled across an odd compilation and interpolation error today in my travels through scala.]]

item.title: Targeting Java Platforms with SBT
item.description: ![CDATA[How to target environments other than your own JVM for SBT. Just in case you're running a legacy environment or environments don't run the same JVMs]]

item.title: An Adventure with strace
item.description: ![CDATA[Troubleshooting an application running in Apache with strace]]

item.title: How to remove your entire google search history
item.description: ![CDATA[Google released the ability to remove your search history from their servers. This is how to do it]]

item.title: PlayFramework XML Templates and Scala
item.description: ![CDATA[XML Templates are easy to make in Play/Scala, and this is a simple tutorial on how to show that]]

item.title: Setting Thousands Separator in Drupal 7
item.description: ![CDATA[How to set the thousands operator in Drupal 7 for fields retrieved through field_view_value]]

item.title: Watermarking Images with Scala (play)
item.description: ![CDATA[Delegating your assets through a Watermarking controller can easily allow one to copyright their images]]

item.title: Elastic Search filtered Aggregations
item.description: ![CDATA[A small example of how to narrow down specificity within elastic search for search tools]]

item.title: Approaching Optimizations
item.description: ![CDATA[My friend requested I write about how I approached an optimization problem, so here it is!]]

item.title: Preparing for Green Up
item.description: ![CDATA[The configuration and setup of the API servers for this years green up vermont.]]

item.title: Write your own service init scripts
item.description: ![CDATA[Ever wonder how to make your services restart when your server does? This is how!]]

item.title: Encrypting your chat with mcabber
item.description: ![CDATA[How to use mcabber and gpg to easily establish a secure and private way of talking to loved ones]]

item.title: A brief look into Scala
item.description: ![CDATA[A random post about some parts of scala I found interesting]]

item.title: Lost and Found Application
item.description: ![CDATA[A highly customizable and user focused application. Meant to help support administrations at events track lost items and assist the people who need them found]]

item.title: Partial Processing of Slow Java Services with ExecutionService
item.description: ![CDATA[If you've ever needed to process partial data that a web service can return, then this post might help you time out so you don't block your whole application]]

item.title: Vim pgp/gpg macros to enhance mutt
item.description: ![CDATA[Two macros to encrypt and decrypt messages easily]]

item.title: Segfault in apt-get while trying to install
item.description: ![CDATA[While trying to install mutt, I ran into a segfault in apt-get, here's how I fixed it]]

item.title: Github Awesome Autocomplete Review
item.description: ![CDATA[A look into how awesome the GitHub Awesome Autocomplete really is, turns out, it's pretty wizard.]]

item.title: Adding Right Click context actions to Caja
item.description: ![CDATA[A simple script to enable stripping of exifdata from the caja file manager]]

item.title: Fixing Chromium's seccomp logging to dmesg
item.description: ![CDATA[If chromium is spamming seccomp error messages to your kernel log, here's how to stop and fix it]]

item.title: Attempting to install Gentoo into VirtualBox
item.description: ![CDATA[This fails, but hopefully if someone knows how to fix it they'll let me know.]]

item.title: Stopping mysql Upstart issues without reinstalling
item.description: ![CDATA[Troubleshooting a broken mysql installation without apt-purging]]

item.title: Plugin to Ban users and deny registration in WordPress
item.description: ![CDATA[An expansion on the last blog post, a simple plugin to help moderate your site]]

item.title: Deny spam emails from registering in WordPress
item.description: ![CDATA[It only takes a single function to mitigate spam accounts clogging your database with spam users.]]

item.title: Context Menu Button to remove Exif Metadata
item.description: ![CDATA[Make removing metadata from images easier by creating a context menu command to do it for you]]

item.title: Change Wordpress login URL

item.title: Create an RSS feed with Harp
item.description: ![CDATA[If you want to add an RSS feed to your website and you're using Harp, this is the post for you]]

item.title: Setting Chromium as the default browser for GotoDocumentation in Sublime Text 2
item.description: ![CDATA[GotoDocumentation is a pretty cool package for ST2 that opens documentation in a keystroke, but it doesn't support chromium or chrome on all platforms, this is how you hack it.]]

item.title: Proxy Paranoia and DNS resolves
item.description: ![CDATA[A few updates and some non-thinking and it's solution. Just a chronicle of fixing a resolv.conf goof]]

item.title: Make your own Mailing List
item.description: ![CDATA[Making a mailing list to share websites and links with your friends is really easy, check out how to do it here.]]

item.description: ![CDATA[Adding and subtracting days in Java, also, how to get the end of the month and first of the month. Useful for database queries and jobs]]

item.title: Displaying Business hours with PHP
item.description: ![CDATA[Storing business hours in a database is a common usecase, having searchable business directories is even better. This is one way to do it]]

item.title: Shared Voice - Activist's tool
item.description: ![CDATA[A tool similar to ThunderClap.it, but more suited for anonymous culture]]

item.title: *Arc: My First Chrome Extension
item.description: ![CDATA[A simple archiving plugin, my first chrome extension and some thoughts on it]]

item.title: Dynamic Tablename's in Order By with NamedParameterJdbc
item.description: ![CDATA[When you want to have a parameterized Order By clause and you need to specify the table as well as the column, this is what you do]]

item.title: Use Native Library Classes in XML Beans (OpenCV)
item.description: ![CDATA[With normal Java classes you can use System.loadLibrary to use native libraries, but what do you do when you're configuring classes via XML?]]

item.title: Order by Rand without a starting ID of 1
item.description: ![CDATA[There are many posts that discuss how not to use order by rand. However all of these fail to address what to do when the distribution of numbers lies at only one extreme of a range. This is how you handle that.]]

item.title: Teaching Through Games
item.description: ![CDATA[Educating young students and mentoring people is a great way to give back to the community, when doing so it's great to engage them, and a great way to do so is through games]]

item.description: ![CDATA[How to fix pepper flash for chromium version 37 after upgrading]]

item.title: Authorize LineItem's, mixed free and paid for causes error
item.description: ![CDATA[Ran into a problem where Authorize.net's API wasn't accepting 0 as a unit price because it wasn't formatted as 0.00, but only when a free and non free item were in the line items.]]

item.description: ![CDATA[Some thoughts after creating a private chat server with c and qdecoder. Planning to create a set of tutorials]]

item.title: Harp CDN Macro Revisited
item.description: ![CDATA[Revisiting a macro in a previous blog post, cleaning it up for browser caching performance]]

item.description: ![CDATA[Playing around with C CGI scripting in order to track spending habits is fun! A look into a side project.]]

item.description: ![CDATA[How to generate a valid XML sitemap for your HarpJS site. It's easy!]]

item.title: Custom Permalinks for Custom Tables and Pages
item.description: ![CDATA[How to create custom permalinks for custom pages and page templates. If you're using a custom table and need to alter information on a Page template based on this, then this blog post is for you!]]

item.title: 'Caught in the Spiders Web' -- A googlebot Heisenbug
item.description: ![CDATA[An interesting bug occured today, and it was all googles fault...]]

item.title: HarpJS and Macros, Static Delivery for Static Content
item.description: ![CDATA[A HarpJS recipe for leveraging CDN's and Static content delivery for your HarpJs site]]

item.title: Spring Batch ItemProcessListener Example
item.description: ![CDATA[I couldn't find an example of an item processor being used anywhere, so I decided to make one myself! A simple and quick example of how to use an ItemProcessListener from Spring Batch's]]

item.title: Serial Hill Climber in GoLang
item.description: ![CDATA[My first foray into GoLang, creating a simple serial hill climber (the simplest of all evolutionary algorithms) in GoLang. Using some of the concurrent features of Go make it a very powerful language for Evolutionary method implementations.]]

item.title: Green Up Vermont
item.description: ![CDATA[A short look into what the Green Up VT launch day was like for the developers at XenonApps who monitored the application all day.]]

item.title: Varnish Directors and API Caching
item.description: ![CDATA[How to setup round robin, and health checks for multiple back ends behind Varnish HTTP Cache. GreenUp VT API Server as a case study.]]

item.description: ![CDATA[How to add links and actions to the 'users.php' page of WordPress via filters.]]

item.description: ![CDATA[How to configure Varnish for caching of RESTful resources for API Servers, the GreenUp Server configuration is used as an example]]

item.description: ![CDATA[A weird configuration problem with TimeZone settings in PHP and how it was fixed.]]

item.description: ![CDATA[When writing pages that have a lot of output, it's beneficial to use Chunked Encoding rather than Content-length, this post talks about doing it for reporting screens in WordPress]]

item.description: ![CDATA[A easy way to trick your computer into using a test environment with a live URL.]]

item.description: ![CDATA[The first of a 3 part blog post where I kept running commentary as I created my TimeCatcher programmer.]]
